name: Generate SEO content from trends spreadsheet to storage (SharePoint/Drive/Dropbox)

parameters.text:
=You are a Social Media Content Creator. The goal is to create a video, audio and image that will get posted along with a blog text as a blog post to the website.
Create a Prompt for video generation, audio generation and image generation that is in line with the usecase and the topic. The prompt should be maximum 1 sentence (short to medium length). The image should not contain any text or images that have text in it (i.e. computer screen with text). The image prompt should maximum have 110 characters.

** USE-CASE ***
{{ $('Configuration Settings').first().json.ENV_USECASE }}

** BLOG POST TOPIC ***
{{ $('Select Topic from Trends').first().json.Selected_Topic }}

Output the 3 fields in a json format with "video_prompt" and "audio_prompt" and "image _prompt".

=Please extract 3 fields out of the following query. Respond with a valid JSON object.
1) "usecase" - string
2) "include_video" - boolean, if not determined "false"
3) "video_duration" - string, if not determined "5". If user wants more than 5, set it to "10". Possible values: either "5" or "10". If the user wants less than 5, set it to "5".

** USER QUERY ***
{{$('Receive Request').first().json.body.text }}

nodes.name: Send message and wait for response

parameters.message:
={{ $json.newsletter_content }}
{{ $json.video?.url ? `
▶ Watch Video
` : '' }}
parameters.subject: SEO Content Approval

parameters.text:
=You are a marketing copywriter tasked with creating content for a B2B newsletter on the topic: "{{ $('Select Topic from Trends').first().json.Selected_Topic }}".

The newsletter template uses the following structure for BOTH German and English versions:

**German Content:**
- {INTRODUCTION_DE}: A 2–3 sentence engaging intro that outlines why the topic is relevant now
- {TOPIC_DE}: The main topic/headline for the section (max. 8 words)
- {DESCRIPTION_DE}: A detailed description of what's new or important about this topic (3-4 sentences)
- {TEASER1_DE}, {TEASER2_DE}, {TEASER3_DE}: Three highlight points showcasing key benefits, insights, or developments (1-2 sentences each)
- {CTA_DE}: A compelling call-to-action encouraging engagement (max. 20 words)
- {FOOTER_TEXT_DE}: Professional closing message (1-2 sentences)
- {FOOTER_NAME_DE}: Sender name/signature

**English Content:**
- {TOPIC_TITLE_EN}: Main newsletter title in English (max. 8 words)
- {INTRODUCTION_EN}: English version of the engaging intro (2–3 sentences)
- {TOPIC_EN}: English version of the main topic/headline (max. 8 words)
- {DESCRIPTION_EN}: English version of the detailed description (3-4 sentences)
- {TEASER1_EN}, {TEASER2_EN}, {TEASER3_EN}: English versions of the three highlight points (1-2 sentences each)
- {CTA_EN}: English version of the call-to-action (max. 20 words)
- {FOOTER_TEXT_EN}: English version of professional closing message (1-2 sentences)
- {FOOTER_NAME_EN}: English version sender name/signature

Tone: professional but accessible, informative, slightly optimistic  
Audience: decision-makers and professionals in marketing, tech, and innovation roles  
Company Context: plemeo.ai (AI-powered marketing solutions)

Please return the result as structured JSON in this format:

```json
{
  "INTRODUCTION_DE": "",
  "TOPIC_DE": "",
  "DESCRIPTION_DE": "",
  "TEASER1_DE": "",
  "TEASER2_DE": "",
  "TEASER3_DE": "",
  "CTA_DE": "",
  "FOOTER_TEXT_DE": "",
  "FOOTER_NAME_DE": "",
  "TOPIC_TITLE_EN": "",
  "INTRODUCTION_EN": "",
  "TOPIC_EN": "",
  "DESCRIPTION_EN": "",
  "TEASER1_EN": "",
  "TEASER2_EN": "",
  "TEASER3_EN": "",
  "CTA_EN": "",
  "FOOTER_TEXT_EN": "",
  "FOOTER_NAME_EN": ""
}
```

parameters.content:
### Trends Input Branch  
**What it does**  
• Downloads a trends spreadsheet from SharePoint.  
• Randomly selects one trending topic for content generation.

**Credentials needed**  
Microsoft SharePoint OAuth2 (for **Get Trends XLSX**).

**User tweaks**  
• Change the spreadsheet file location in **Get Trends XLSX**.  
• Modify selection logic in **Select Topic from Trends** (currently random; could be weighted, chronological, etc.).

### Newsletter Template Branch  
**What it does**  
• Downloads your HTML template from SharePoint.  
• **Extract from Text File → Build Newsletter** replaces placeholders with AI-generated content.

**Credentials needed**  
Microsoft SharePoint OAuth2 (for **Get Newsletter Template**).

**User must provide**  
• Your own HTML template with these exact placeholders:  
  `{{INTRODUCTION_DE}} {{TOPIC_DE}} {{DESCRIPTION_DE}} {{TEASER1_DE}} {{TEASER2_DE}} {{TEASER3_DE}} {{CTA_DE}} {{FOOTER_TEXT_DE}} {{FOOTER_NAME_DE}} {{TOPIC_TITLE_EN}} {{INTRODUCTION_EN}} {{TOPIC_EN}} {{DESCRIPTION_EN}} {{TEASER1_EN}} {{TEASER2_EN}} {{TEASER3_EN}} {{CTA_EN}} {{FOOTER_TEXT_EN}} {{FOOTER_NAME_EN}}`  
• Upload this template to the SharePoint folder referenced in **Get Newsletter Template**.

### Image Assets Branch  
**What it does**  
• Uses Pollinations AI to create a 1080 × 1350 image from the AI-generated `image_prompt`.  
• Converts to binary and uploads to Velvet Syndicate (optional CDN).

**Credentials needed**  
None (Pollinations & Velvet accept unauthenticated requests).

**User tweaks**  
• Edit the prompt in **Generate Video and Audio Prompt** to change image style.  
• Replace Velvet Syndicate URL in **Send Data to Download Service** if using another CDN.

### Video Assets Branch  
**What it does**  
• **FAL AI (kling-video)** creates a short video from the generated image.  
• **FAL AI (lyria2)** generates background music.  
• FFmpeg API merges video + audio → returns a public `video.url`.

**Credentials needed**  
`ENV_FALAI_APIKEY` (stored in **Configuration Settings**).

**User tweaks**  
• Set `include_video` and `video_duration` via webhook request.  
• Edit `video_prompt` & `audio_prompt` generation in **Generate Video and Audio Prompt**.

### Storage Branch  
**What it does**  
• Converts newsletter HTML, generated JPG, and video URL into binary files.  
• Uploads all three files to SharePoint (or your chosen storage).

**Credentials needed**  
Microsoft SharePoint OAuth2 (for all three **Upload …** nodes).

**User tweaks**  
• Change target folder IDs in each upload node.  
• Replace SharePoint nodes with Google Drive, Dropbox, S3, etc.  
• Modify filename pattern (currently `${random_filename}.html/.jpg/.txt`).

main.node: Send message and wait for response
